title: A LADY'S SECRET
description: Like any young woman, Doris has dreams and aspirations and just maybe, has found love.Yet unlike the other young women, she has a secret - a secret that must never be revealed.Doris has observed her father and uncles struggle to build a life in Canada since she can remember. It is only when she falls in love with a dark-haired man with haunted eyes fleeing Europe that she learns the truth.Harry awakens more than her heart as Doris learns the price of freedom.This novel is based on a true story.
author: Angeline Gallant
